title: Foretell
description: If you could provide anyone with the path to their deepest, darkest desires, would you?Estelle Spencer has no choice.With just a simple touch of her hand, wishes and dreams are instantly fulfilled. Her voice speaks of its own accord, lighting the way to good fortune.But not everyone’s fortunes are desirable.For most of her life Estelle hides in fear, living as a recluse in her sister’s shadow. Until the day comes when her existence is remembered.Forced into running, Estelle meets Rex, a Romanian gypsy, and the only person who can help her hide. Together they search for a way to end the curse that controls Estelle’s life.Before she destroys the world.
author: Belle Malory
